properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-tel}ప్రవిమలుడా పావనుడా స్తుతిస్తోత్రము నీకే పరమునుండి ప్రవహించె మాపై కృప వెంబడి కృపలు{/lang-tel}
{lang-hin}करूणामय प्रभु, पवित्र है तू, स्तुति तेरी करते हैं, प्रेम तेरा स्वर्ग से हम पर उण्डेला, अनुग्रह तेरा, हम ने पाया है{/lang-hin}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nee mandira samruddhivalana thruptiparachu Chunnavugaa ananda pravaaha jalamunu Maaku thraaga nitchitivi koniyaadedamu nee Krupakai aanandinchuchu paadedamu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Devuni sampoornathalo mammu pari shuddulugaa Jesiyunnavu jnaanamunaku minchina prema Maalo bayalu parachitivi kruthajnatalu Chellinchuchu poojinchedamu ninneppudu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Daivatwamu nindi yundenugaa kristu Yesu Prabhuvu nandu aayana yandu sampoornulugaa Mammu jesi yunnavu saagila paduchu nee Krupakai aaraadintumu ninnilalo{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nirdoshulugaa niraparaadhulugaa nee rakhtamu Tho mamujesitivi sarva sampoornata maakitchi Siluvalo sandhijesitivi nityamu ninnu stutinchi Ghanaparachedamu ninnilalo{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Krupaa satya sampoornudavai maa madyalo Nivasinchitivi lokamunandu nammabaditivi Adviteeya thanayudavai niratamu ninnu kertinchi Samaajamulo paadedamu{/lang-eng}
